com.mca.assemblyline.assembly

Class BuilderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mca.assemblyline.assembly.BuilderFactory

  • public class BuilderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class builds the individual components

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BuilderFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComponentToBuild(Component component)
      This notifies the assembly line that a new component is to be built, therefore its added to the list of components under construction
      void componentCompleteNotifier(Component component)
      This notifies the assembly line that a component has been completed, therefore its removed from the list of components under construction and adds the next component needed to the queue of needed components
      static BuilderFactory getInstance()
      This returns the instance of this class

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        public static BuilderFactory getInstance()
        This returns the instance of this class
        Returns:
        The instance of this class

      • addComponentToBuild

        public void addComponentToBuild(Component component)
        This notifies the assembly line that a new component is to be built, therefore its added to the list of components under construction
        Parameters:
        component - The component to add to the list

      • componentCompleteNotifier

        public void componentCompleteNotifier(Component component)
        This notifies the assembly line that a component has been completed, therefore its removed from the list of components under construction and adds the next component needed to the queue of needed components
        Parameters:
        component - The component to remove from the list and the next one to add to the queue
